content.text: 1 (5.5 ounce) package au gratin instant potato mix
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 (5.5 ounce) package au gratin instant potato mix" )
( ing-2 "1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed chicken broth" )

content.text: 0) In a large saucepan or pot, combine potatoes, au gratin potato mix, chicken broth and water.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@31:38 / AC
		:loc ( "or"@-1:-1 / CHOICE
			:option ( tool-0-0 "a large saucepan"@6:22 / TOOL )
			:option ( tool-0-1 "pot"@26:29 / TOOL )
		)
		:ppt ( ing-0 "potatoes"@39:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "au gratin potato mix"@49:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "chicken broth"@71:84 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "water"@89:94 / FOOD )
		:_result ( potato-mixture )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Add more water to cover if necessary.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "more water"@7:17 / FOOD )
		:gol ( chicken-mixture / FOOD )
		:todo ( cond-1-0 "if necessary"@27:39 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:prp ( purp-1-0 "to cover"@18:26 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:_result ( potato-in-water )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are tender, about  40 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( "medium heat"@13:24 / OTHER )
		:simultaneous ( ac-2-1 "stirring"@26:34 / AC )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until potatoes are tender"@49:74 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "40 minutes"@83:93 / DUR )
		:ppt ( chicken-in-water / FOOD )
		:_result ( cooked-potato )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Stir in cream and heat through.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
   :inform ( "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
      :ppt ( ing-4 "cream"@11:16 / FOOD )
      :gol ( cooked-potato / FOOD )
	:_result creamed-potato
   )
   :inform ( "heat"@21:25 / AC
      :ppt ( creamed-potato / FOOD )
	:_result heated-potato
   )
)
